name: (Discounted) Mocha disappears after “–”-removal of the other items
description:
As a user
  I want the (Discounted) Mocha to disappear
  When I remove the other cups with the minus button
  So that I understand the Lucky-Day offer rules
descriptionHtml:
As a user
I want the (Discounted) Mocha to disappear
When I remove the other cups with the minus button
So that I understand the Lucky-Day offer rules
statusMessage:
The following asserts failed:
	(Discounted) Mocha should not be present in cart expected [null] but found [com.coffeecart.ui.component.FullItemComponent@38499139],
	Total button should not be displayed when cart is empty expected [false] but found [true],
	Empty cart message should be displayed expected [true] but found [false],
	Cart counter should show 0 items but shows 1 expected [0] but found [1]

steps.name: Given  I am on the menu page
When  I click on "Espresso" drink 3 times
Click on cup with title: Espresso
Click on Cup body
Click on cup with title: Espresso
Click on Cup body
Click on cup with title: Espresso
Click on Cup body
Then  I verify "Lucky Day" modal appears with extra cup of Mocha
When  I click on "Yes, of course!" button
Click «Yes, of course!»
Click on the element
And  I verify cart counter shows "4" items
And  I go to cart page
Navigate to the Cart Page
Click on Cart page
And  I verify discounted mocha is present in cart with quantity 1
When  I minus all non-discounted items from cart
Click remove button of cart list item n times
Then  I verify "(Discounted) Mocha" is not present in cart
And  I verify total button is not displayed
And  I verify empty cart message is displayed
And  I verify cart counter shows "0" items
